basicInfo.name: Drillo
basicInfo.flavor: Drillo once used his armor to fend a reaper off from a group of armadillos. Now they follow him everywhere as their leader.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Spiky Shield
Skill 1.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Defense Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 13%.
 - Grants 1 Debuff Removal(s).

Passive.name: Tough Shell
Passive.desc:
Self
 - Grants Block Rate Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
スキル強化効果
 - Increases Effect: Block Rate Boost to 21%.

profile.story:
Drillo is an armadillo beastkin living in the Blazing Desert. The desert dwellers think of him as a shelled monster.
His spiky armor is made from metal and boasts high defense, but has made him very slow.
Since he struggles with the blazing heat during the day and the freezing cold at night, he has considered discarding the heavy armor.
One day, he encountered other armadillos chased by a reaper, the Terror of the Dunes, and Drillo was able to fend off the reaper thanks to his armor.
From that day forward, Drillo swore he would never consider abandoning it ever again.
The other armadillos have banded together around him.

basicInfo.name: Drillo
basicInfo.flavor: Drillo's spiked metallic carapace greatly improved his defense. However, due to its weight, he sacrificed his speed for defense.
